sourcesContent:
<script>
import { defineComponent, ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import { Bar } from 'vue-chartjs';
import { Chart, registerables } from 'chart.js';
Chart.register(...registerables);

export default defineComponent({
components: {
  'bar-chart': Bar
},
setup() {
  const usageData = ref([10, 20, 30, 15, 25, 35, 10, 20, 30, 15, 25, 35, 10, 20, 30, 15, 25, 35, 10, 20, 56, 10, 20, 30]);
  const chartData = ref({
    labels: Array.from({ length: 24 }, (_, i) => i.toString()),
      datasets: [{
        label: '집중 시간(분)',
        data: [],
        backgroundColor: [],
      }]
    });
  const chartOptions = ref({
    responsive: true,
    maintainAspectRatio: true,
    scales: {
      y: {
      beginAtZero: true,
      max: 60
      }
    },
    plugins: {
      legend: {
      display: false
      }
    }
  });

  const updateChartData = () => {
    const maxUsage = Math.max(...usageData.value);
    chartData.value.datasets[0].data = usageData.value;
    const maxUsageColor = 'rgba(0, 123, 255, 1)'; // 최대 사용량 막대 색상 (파란색)
    const defaultColor = 'rgba(173, 216, 230, 0.6)'; // 기본 막대 색상 (연한 파란색)
    chartData.value.datasets[0].backgroundColor = usageData.value.map(value => value === maxUsage ? maxUsageColor : defaultColor);
  };

  onMounted(() => {
    updateChartData();
  });

  return {
    chartData,
    chartOptions
  };
}
});
</script>

<style scoped>
  .box {
  height: 300px;
  width: 644px;
  position: relative;
}

.box canvas.chart {
  height: 250px !important;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box !important;
}

h2 {
  color: #b0bec5;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}
</style>
